com.netflix.spectator.sandbox

Class BucketTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.spectator.sandbox.BucketTimer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.netflix.spectator.api.Meter, com.netflix.spectator.api.Timer

    public final class BucketTimer
extends Object
implements com.netflix.spectator.api.Timer
    Timers that get updated based on the bucket for recorded values.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static BucketTimer get(com.netflix.spectator.api.Id id,
                              BucketFunction f)
        Creates a timer object that manages a set of timers based on the bucket function supplied. Calling record will be mapped to the record on the appropriate timer.
        Parameters:
        id - Identifier for the metric being registered.
        f - Function to map values to buckets.
        Returns:
        Timer that manages sub-timers based on the bucket function.

      • get

        public static BucketTimer get(com.netflix.spectator.api.Registry registry,
                              com.netflix.spectator.api.Id id,
                              BucketFunction f)
        Creates a timer object that manages a set of timers based on the bucket function supplied. Calling record will be mapped to the record on the appropriate timer.
        Parameters:
        registry - Registry to use.
        id - Identifier for the metric being registered.
        f - Function to map values to buckets.
        Returns:
        Timer that manages sub-timers based on the bucket function.
